main event: A balloon with a gondola attached was reported to have burst, and the gondola was observed dropping.
interesting points: The object was observed both visually and on radar.
The object was described as bursting and a gondola dropping from it.
The sighting occurred in Hartford, Connecticut.
The report mentions a previous sighting of metallic saucer-shaped objects maneuvering in the sky with a peculiar swaying motion.
The observers were unable to estimate the size or altitude of the objects they previously saw.
sighted object: a balloon with a gondola attached that burst and the gondola dropped
